overview: Get radiant and glowing skin with our GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum. Formulated with Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, this serum helps brighten and even out your complexion. Suitable for oily and combination skin types.
key_benefits: Brightens and evens out skin tone
how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen. Gently massage the serum into your skin until fully absorbed. Use daily for optimal results.
who_is_it_for: This serum is perfect for individuals with oily and combination skin types who want to achieve a brighter and more even-toned complexion. It's also great for those who want to reduce the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation.
ingredients_section: Our GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum contains key ingredients like Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid. These powerful antioxidants and humectants work together to provide long-lasting hydration and brightening benefits to the skin.
